title: G-5 "Red Herrings"

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may select a player, amnesticizing them, this causes them to forget the previous and next day, locking them out of those daychats and role-blocking them.

desc:
Post 4487
*" All remaining survivors are advised to remain in the evacuation shelter or any other safe area until the unit has secured the facility. "*
